name: Hive - Demo
description:
This is a prototype 2D side scrolling beam 'em up. There is ony one short level with a boss at the end. I am looking for feedback from players before investing more time into the mechanics, artwork and level design.

All artwork and sounds are placeholders. I have not rights to the sfx but I did compose the background music myself.

Please email info@christopherball.net with your feedback.

Did you enjoy playing Hive?

How did you find the combat?

Was the level too short, too long or just right?

Would you like to see this game made into a full game with better graphics and more attacks/combos?

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys

Punch - X

Thank you for testing the prototype. I look forward to hearing your thoughts!
